meanings.definition: Relating to or produced by a kymograph.
meanings.sent1: The kymographic paper showed the heartbeat pattern clearly.
meanings.sent2: The kymographic machine was used to measure muscle contractions.
meanings.sent3: The kymographic results were so wavy, they looked like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as precise as a kymographic recording.
meanings.sent5: The kymographic image etched in my mind was like a detailed map of activity.

meanings.definition: A device for recording variations in pressure, velocity, or other physiological parameters.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a kymographic to track changes in air pressure.
meanings.sent2: The kymographic displayed the speed of the moving object accurately.
meanings.sent3: The kymographic seemed to dance with the changing numbers on its screen.
meanings.sent4: The kymographic acted like a silent observer, capturing every fluctuation.
meanings.sent5: The kymographic hummed softly as it documented the heartbeat rhythm.
